argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | hlhil0.h | |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) |
| 2 |  | hlhil0.l | |- L = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) |
| 3 |  | hlhil0.u | |- U = ( ( HLHil ` K ) ` W ) |
| 4 |  | hlhil0.k | |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) |
| 5 |  | hlhillsm.a | |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` L ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( ph -> ( Base ` L ) = ( Base ` L ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` L ) = ( Base ` L ) |
| 8 | 1, 3, 4, 2, 7 | #P_hlhilbase | |- ( ph -> ( Base ` L ) = ( Base ` U ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +g ` L ) = ( +g ` L ) |
| 10 | 1, 3, 4, 2, 9 | #P_hlhilplus | |- ( ph -> ( +g ` L ) = ( +g ` U ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_oveqdr | |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. ( Base ` L ) /\ y e. ( Base ` L ) ) ) -> ( x ( +g ` L ) y ) = ( x ( +g ` U ) y ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) e. _V |
| 13 | 2, 12 | #P_eqeltri | |- L e. _V |
| 14 | 13 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> L e. _V ) |
| 15 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( ( HLHil ` K ) ` W ) e. _V |
| 16 | 3, 15 | #P_eqeltri | |- U e. _V |
| 17 | 16 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> U e. _V ) |
| 18 | 6, 8, 11, 14, 17 | #P_lsmpropd | |- ( ph -> ( LSSum ` L ) = ( LSSum ` U ) ) |
| 19 | 5, 18 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( ph -> .(+) = ( LSSum ` U ) ) |
